mapper.select: select review.num as num, member.name as member_name, place_id, place.name as place_name, stars, content, created_at from review, member, place where review.member_num = member.num and review.place_id = place.id order by created_at desc limit #{start}, #{perpage}

select review.num, member.num as member_num, member.name as member_name, place_id, place.name as place_name, category, stars, content, created_at from review, member, place where review.member_num = member.num and review.place_id = place.id and place_id = #{place_id}
select round(avg(stars), 2) from review where place_id = #{id}
select count(*) from place where id = #{place_id}
mapper.insert: insert into place (id, name, category, phone, x, y, address) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{category}, #{phone}, #{x}, #{y}, #{address})
insert into review (member_num, place_id, stars, content, photos) values (#{member_num}, #{place_id}, #{stars}, #{content}, #{photos})
mapper.update: update review set stars = #{stars}, content = #{content} where num = #{num}
